name: Devil Runner Fun Games For Free
name_original: Devil Runner Fun Games For Free
description:
Devil runner is a fun, addetiv,interesting running game. There are a lot of challenge and the nice 3D environment.

Devil runner is jump fantasy.

- swipe left and right for avoiding obstacles
- jump Devil to avoid blocks
- run the Devil as fast as possible!
- very easy controls (swipe and touch Screen)
- great power and bonuses

Go as far as possible and collect coins to beat your friend.

- Nice graphics and sounds
- Addictive scenario
- Easy to controls
- Unlimited free game play
- Endlessly challenging and fun for boys & girls of all ages
